SENTENCE.STRING: (pronounced [IPA: [ˈbʊdɑpɛʃt]]) is the capital city of Hungary and the country's principal political, cultural, commercial, industrial and transportation center.
has approximately 1.7 million inhabitants, down from a mid-1980s peak of 2.1 million.

became a single city occupying both banks of the river Danube with the amalgamation on 17 November 1873 of right-bank (west) Buda (Ofen in German) and Óbuda (Old Buda or Alt-Ofen) together with Pest on the left (east) bank.
is the seventh largest city in the European Union.
